text: This page walks you through exactly how Lead Velocity works, how pricing is structured, and whether it's a fit for your business.

text: Most brokers have been burned by lead generation before. Here's what they tell us:
Contacts who were never interested or qualified.
Twenty leads one week, none the next.
Wrong numbers. Fake emails. No opt-in.
Hours chasing leads that never close.
Lead Velocity is structured and intentional. We're not another lead vendor hoping something sticks. We're a system designed for consistent, predictable growth.
classes: text-base sm:text-lg lg:text-xl text-muted-foreground leading-relaxed max-w-3xl mx-auto
text-sm font-medium tracking-[0.25em] uppercase text-primary/90 flex items-center gap-2
text-3xl sm:text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold tracking-tight leading-[1.1]

text: A structured approach to lead generation that puts you in control.
We work with you to establish exactly who you want to reach. Geographic area, income bracket, product focus.
Lead Velocity runs campaigns designed to attract prospects matching your criteria. Fresh, targeted contacts.
Before a lead reaches you, it's checked against the profile we defined together. Quality over volume.
Leads arrive on a predictable schedule. No surprises. You know what's coming and when.
Conversion rates, feedback, and adjustments are built into the process.

classes: text-sm font-medium tracking-[0.25em] uppercase text-primary/90 flex items-center gap-2
text-3xl sm:text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold tracking-tight leading-[1.1]

text: This definition protects your spend and ensures your time is spent on conversations that matter.

classes: text-sm font-medium tracking-[0.25em] uppercase text-accent/90 flex items-center gap-2
text-3xl sm:text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold tracking-tight leading-[1.1]

text: Before we discuss numbers, let's talk about what drives them.

Lead costs aren't arbitrary. They're driven by market demand, targeting specificity, product complexity, and geographic factors. A life insurance lead in Johannesburg costs differently than a commercial policy lead in a rural area. This is economics, not pricing games.
Brokers often say, "Let me try 5 leads and see how it goes." Here's the problem: 5 leads tells you nothing. Statistical significance requires volume. Consistency drives conversion.
The question isn't "what does a lead cost?"—it's "what does inconsistency cost you?"

classes: text-sm font-medium tracking-[0.25em] uppercase text-secondary/90 flex items-center gap-2
text-3xl sm:text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold tracking-tight leading-[1.1]

text: Lead Velocity delivers. But delivery without action is waste.
Leads contacted within 5 minutes convert dramatically higher.
Track, status, and work leads systematically.
Don't request more than you can actually work.
Contacts that match your criteria with genuine interest.
Weekly batches you can plan around. No surprises.
Continuous refinement based on conversion data.
Always know what's happening and what's next.

classes: text-3xl sm:text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold tracking-tight leading-[1.1]

text: At this point, the right approach depends entirely on your current setup, budget, and growth goals.
The form below isn't a commitment—it's a strategy snapshot. Your answers help us understand your situation and prepare a tailored recommendation before we meet.
